title: 2013 RAM 3500 Laramie Longhorn Cummins Turbo Diesel Dually Truck with Aisin Automatic Transmission
item_description:
2013 RAM 3500 Laramie Longhorn Cummins Turbo Diesel Dually Truck with Aisin Automatic Transmission

Specifications

  • Year: 2013
  • Make: RAM
  • Model: 3500
  • VIN: 3C63RRKL0DG608866
  • Oregon License: 009GWG
    • Oregon Registration Expiration: 5/13/2026
  • Odometer Reads: 304642
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 14,000 LB
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: Cummins 6.7L Turbo Diesel
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Aisin Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT235/80R17
  • Deck Length: 98”
  • Deck Width: 64”
  • Wall Height: 20.5”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Brown
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Brown
  • Features:
    • Backup Camera
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • CD Player
    • Cruise Control
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Navigation
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Sunroof
    • Trailer Hitch
    • Air Conditioning
    • Touch Screen
    • Bed Liner
    • Dual Rear Wheels

Note: This vehicle is currently registered in Oregon. The buyer will receive a Certificate of Oregon Title and Oregon Bill of Sale 1-2 weeks following removal. The Seller is selling this vehicle "as-is" without smog as the vehicle is currently not registered with California DMV. The Buyer agrees to sign an "as-is" no smog Bill of Sale. The buyer agrees to 1. be fully responsible for the vehicle registration process from Oregon to California (if they so choose), 2. to smog if they want to transfer registration to California, 3. any repairs to the vehicle for smog (if any), 4. inspections and 5. taxes and all fees due to DMV to register this vehicle in the Buyers name. A bid placed on this lot is an agreement to these terms by the Seller. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual, the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same."
